entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 16.

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
